Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires landlords of rent stabilized housing accommodations to immediately add the name of the tenant's spouse to the lease and any renewals thereof upon request by the tenant
Summary: Requires landlords of rent stabilized housing accommodations to immediately add the names of the tenant's spouse to the lease and any renewals thereof upon request by the tenant.
LawCode: Amd ยง25-611, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring landlords of rent stabilized housing accommodations to immediately add the name of the tenant's spouse to the lease and any renewals thereof upon request by the tenant
